name: WHO I CHOOSE
overview:
WHO I CHOOSE is an online platform that merges social networking with recommendation sharing.

Users create “Choice Lists” to share who they recommend for professionals, service providers, and other businesses. Businesses are ranked and sorted into a geographically searchable database for consumers to identify top chosen businesses in multiple locations. The platform gives businesses a tool to connect with their fans, share offers and deals, and gain intelligent insight into their best customers.

Using an innovative approach of merging recommendation sharing and social networking by centralizing the information around user profiles creates a highly powerful and effective tool. This allows users to easily find trusted recommendations and many high quality professionals and businesses that go unnoticed amongst search and other social platforms.

The ability to “Unchoose” a business on the platform for failing to meet expectations allows a user to express discontent without subjecting a business to a negative review narrative online. If on their list, users are permitted up to 40 characters of positive based kudos to explain why they recommend a business.

Recommendations from people we trust are the most powerful. WHO I CHOOSE takes the referral conversations that happen spontaneously everyday and consolidates them online. The platform opens businesses to a much larger audience by expanding the number of potential new customers across social circles and geographies.
